Description: Section (two fragments joined) of the shoulder-section of a light-brown pottery jar (ostracon), the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of three lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as year 7 incense.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393533) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393533)
